ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Ancient Coin Quest Failure
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Every box quest - any quest where you get a container to put the items in - is the same:  Once you get the items in the box, you have to hit combine ,
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:53 AM 6/15/00 -0500, you wrote:

> I'm reporting this as a bug - but did I do something wrong? Does
> it matter
>what order the coins are inserted in the box? In hind-sight the NPC said I
>need to "Combine" them in the box. Is "Combining" something special I
>needed to do?

Every "box" quest - any quest where you get a container to put the items in
- is the same: Once you get the items in the box, you have to hit
"combine", which makes a new item that you give to the quest mob to get
your reward.

> While it would be nice to expect a response from Verant - I'm
> guessing I
>can get another set of the coins before I get a response from my email.

This is more than true - they won't even reply in this case. Sorry to say.

Talies the Wanderer
